quoteText:
Modification <dl>
<dt>11.1</dt>
<dd>Forbes shall have the right, at its discretion, to change, modify, add or remove terms of this agreement at any time without notice.
Changes shall be effective immediately.
You agree to review this agreement periodically since subsequent use by you of the Website or Other Channels shall constitute your acceptance of any changes.
title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
